snippet: Arsenal Manager Arsène Wenger hinted he would throw caution to the wind in trying to overcome a 4-0 first-leg deficit against A.C. Milan in the Champions League on Tuesday.
abstract: Arsenal Manager Arsène Wenger hinted he would throw caution to the wind in trying to overcome a 4-0 first-leg deficit against A.C. Milan in the Champions League on Tuesday.

headline.main: Champions League Preview: Arsenal's Wenger Going for Broke
